item.title: Build Your Free Image Hosting System from Scratch (Cloudflare R2 + WebP Cloud + PicGo)
item.description: Preface In the article “What Changed in My Blog in 2024”, I introduced the blog system I built using Serverless platforms and some open-source projects, and also started this series of tutorials to document the entire build and deployment process. This article is about the solution for the image hosting system. [2024-07-02 Update] I wrote a new tutorial implementing privacy and copyright protection for the image hosting system, which can be considered an additional chapter.
